description: Discover the best hotels in Danang, Vietnam. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Vietnam Five-Star Beachfront Stay near Hội An with Dreamy Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Discover a palm-fringed oasis at the luxurious Shilla Monogram Danang, a dazzling beachfront resort located on the golden sands between Danang and the historic town of Hội An, Vietnam. With private beach access, this serene escape invites you to savour slow, secluded afternoons in the relaxing sunshine by crystal-clear waters. This elegant retreat flaunts state-of-the-art facilities like a tranquil bamboo forest garden, lavish infinity pool and floating yoga classes. Sink your toes into the soft sands of Ha My Beach or treat your tastebuds to locally sourced cuisine at the resort's restaurant and bistro.

hotels.title: Beachfront Danang Pullman Luxury with Onsite Restaurants & Spa
hotels.description: With an enviable location on the pristine white sands of Bac My An Beach, Pullman Danang Beach Resort is an oasis in Central Vietnam. Perfect for a peaceful couples’ getaway or a holiday with the kids, you’ll find there’s something for everyone at Pullman Da Nang. With superb restaurants, a tranquil spa, an excellent pool, top-class hospitality and easy access to Hoi An’s famous Old Town, you’ll be able to relax and unwind in style during your time in Danang.

hotels.title: Stylish Danang Green Island Stay with Four Onsite Restaurants & Spa
hotels.description: Decode Vietnamese wonders with a stay at this gorgeous property, on Danang's Green Island. Locally-inspired decor and welcome traditions make you smile as you are led to your luxurious rooms. Dining is an absolute delight with a multitude of gourmet outlets onsite, including authentic Cantonese at the Golden Dragon and local classics at Veranda Vietnamese. Take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or maintain your fitness routine at the state-of-the-art gym. The Karma Spa is always ready to offer relaxation in the form of therapies and massages and the kids' lounge takes pride in keeping the future generation entertained with toys, movies and more.

hotels.title: Five-Star Vietnam Beachfront Bliss near Da Nang
hotels.description: Recharge your imagination with a luxe stay at the InterContinental Danang Sun Peninsula Resort - a spectacular beachfront haven on the central coast of Vietnam. Soak up every moment of bliss from this beachfront haven wrapped by jungle greenery, and enjoy direct beach access, plunge into one of three pools, release tension at the lavish spa, enliven your senses at five restaurants and bars, or relax in your accommodation, offering striking designs calmed by fresh breezes and secluded in nature.
